pli-tv-pvr20:1.3: [Sp.5.479](): _Avippavāsena anāpattīti sahagāraseyyāya anāpatti_, “‘There no offense for one who is not staying apart’: there is no offense for sleeping in the same house.”
pli-tv-pvr20:1.4:
[Vmv.5.479](): _Pañhā mesāti ettha ma-kāro
padasandhikaro_, “_Pañhā mesā_: here the syllable ‘_ma_’ creates a junction between the words.”
